answers.answer: You drink a super sugary drink and you wait an hour then have your blood taken. It's to check to see if you have gestational diabetes. If you fail it, you do it again except this time you wait three hours till you have your blood taken.
I have to do a 2hour fasting glucose test tomorrow. Not looking forward to it @ all

question: Hi what is a glucose test? What do they do to you?
title: question
